verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Sometimes] you just [V: have] to wonder what planet Paul Krugman , the radical , left - wing columnist and economist for the New York Times , is living on . On Sunday morning , the journalist went on a tweet storm complaining that the media was n’t presenting Trump accurately ... because they were presenting him as sane .
